wikipedia_page.main: Ruzwana Bashir (born 28 July 1983) is a British entrepreneur, founder and CEO of Peek, a travel company based in San Francisco, California. She was selected in 2012 for Forbes 30 Under 30 list on Technology and in 2014 for Fast Company's 100 Most Creative People as well as Vanity Fair's Next Establishment.

response: * Ruzwana Bashir – British businesswoman, former Oxford Union President and founder and CEO of Peek.com, travel company based in San Francisco, California
* Ruzwana Bashir – first British Asian woman to become President of the Oxford Union
